TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InertiaTranslationBehavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制平移操作在慣性期間的減速。

span.span: Controls deceleration on a translation manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會指定當慣性轉譯操作行為的方式。The class specifies how a translation manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用屬性事件，以執行下列動作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 藉由設定開始時指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 慣性結束藉由設定時，指定所要的位置操作的屬性。Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定指定慣性所需的減速屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例所示事件處理常式，並設定所需的減速的轉譯、 擴充，以及使用慣性期間的旋轉。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double DesiredDeceleration { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定線性移動變慢的速率 (每平方毫秒 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural] (~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)])。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate the linear movement slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.

value.span: 線性移動會減緩中的速率 [！INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 每平方毫秒。

span.span: The rate the linear movement slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] per squared millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定所需的減速慣性。Use the property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.

summary.span: 取得或設定操作在慣性結束時的直線移動。

span.span: Gets or sets the linear movement of the manipulation at the end of inertia.

value.span: 操作在慣性結束時的直線移動。

span.span: The linear movement of the manipulation at the end of inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定所要的位置的操作，慣性結束時。Use the property to specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.

summary.span: 取得或設定直線移動在慣性階段開始時的初始速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the initial rate of linear movement at the start of the inertia phase.
